name: Playdate With Myself
description:
A boy traumatized by the outside world decides to live the life of a hikikomori. Follow his story as he plays his days away. Will he acclimate to his new life or will his new life consume him? Controls (rebindable) MoveWASD or ⬆️⬇️⬅️➡️
InteractSpace or Left Click
Credits

Code - Nothing#3367

Art - AJ#3414

Sound - Cryvera#4210

The game was completed during the Game/Music Jam. The jam theme was "Growth".
